casebody.data:
Carlos D. GURGANIOUS
v.
SENIOR RESIDENT SUPERIOR COURT JUDGE, New Hanover County. No. 43P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. Carlos Gurganious, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 29th day of January 2004 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, New Hanover County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 5th day of February 2004."
